content.about: Mary Peck Art Advisory provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Modern/Contemporary Art, Paintings, Sculpture, Prints, Photography, IRS-compliant charitable donation and estate tax appraisals. With 16+ experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Based in Denver, serves Aspen and other areas in Colorado.
